ing: 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
des: "This was my grandmothers recipe.  It's easy and very good and I hope you enjoy it."
ins: In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat; brown garlic lightly. Stir in tomatoes, salt, pepper, parsley and basil. Pour in water and let it come to a boil.  Reduce heat to low and cook 2 hours stirring occasionally so it doesn't stick to bottom of pan.
